20 template<typename T>
21 float find_diameter_exact(const int N, const int D,
22  const std::vector<T>& v) {
23  // Note that indexing is of the form: [i * D + j]
24  int offset;
25  size_t max = 0;
26  float d;
27  for (int n = 0; n < N; ++n) {
28  offset = n * D;
29  for (int i = n + 1; i < N; ++i) {
30  // d(v[n], v[i])
31  d = squared_Eucl_distance<T>(v, offset, offset + D, i * D + D);
32  if (d > max) {
33  max = d;
34  }
35  }
36  }
37  return sqrt(max);
38 }
39 
49 template<typename T>
50 float find_diameter_exact(const std::vector<T>& v_p,
51  std::vector<size_t>::iterator& v_i_begin,
52  std::vector<size_t>::iterator& v_i_end,
53  const size_t D) {
54  // Note that indexing is of the form: [i * D + j]
55  size_t max = 0;
56  float d;
57  size_t offset1;
58  for(std::vector<size_t>::iterator it1 = v_i_begin; it1 != v_i_end; ++it1) {
59  offset1 = *it1 * D;
60  for(std::vector<size_t>::iterator it2 = it1 + 1; it2 != v_i_end; ++it2) {
61  // d(v[i], v[i + 1])
62  d = squared_Eucl_distance<T>(v_p, offset1, offset1 + D, *it2 * D);
63  if (d > max) {
64  max = d;
65  }
66  }
67  }
68  return sqrt(max);
69 }

93 template<typename T>
94 float find_diameter_appr(const int N, const int D,
95  const std::vector<T>& v) {
96  // Note that indexing is of the form: [i * D + j]
97  int offset, offset_x = random(N) * D;
98  size_t max = 0;
99  int point_y_index;
100  float d;
101  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
102  offset = i * D;
103  // d(v[i], x)
104  d = squared_Eucl_distance<T>(v, offset, offset + D, offset_x);
105  if (d > max) {
106  max = d;
107  point_y_index = i;
108  }
109  }
110  int offset_y = point_y_index * D;
111  max = 0;
112  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
113  offset = i * D;
114  // d(v[i], y)
115  d = squared_Eucl_distance<T>(v, offset, offset + D, offset_y);
116  if (d > max) {
117  max = d;
118  }
119  }
120  return sqrt(max);
121 }
122 
146 template<typename T>
147 float find_diameter_appr(const std::vector<T>& v_p,
148  std::vector<size_t>::iterator &v_i_begin,
149  std::vector<size_t>::iterator &v_i_end,
150  const size_t D) {
151  // Note that indexing is of vector is of the form: [i * D + j]
152  // size = std::distance(itBegin, itEnd) for non-"Random Access" iterators
153  size_t N = v_i_end - v_i_begin;
154  size_t offset, offset_x = random(N) * D;
155  float d, max = 0;
156  size_t index_y = 0;
157  for(std::vector<size_t>::iterator it = v_i_begin; it != v_i_end; ++it) {
158  offset = *it * D;
159  d = squared_Eucl_distance<T>(v_p, offset, offset + D, offset_x);
160  if(d > max) {
161  max = d;
162  index_y = *it;
163  }
164  }
165  max = 0;
166  size_t offset_y = index_y * D;
167  for(std::vector<size_t>::iterator it = v_i_begin; it != v_i_end; ++it) {
168  offset = *it * D;
169  d = squared_Eucl_distance<T>(v_p, offset, offset + D, offset_y);
170  if(d > max) {
171  max = d;
172  }
173  }
174  return sqrt(max);
175 }

Generates (uniformly) a random number in [0, n].
